description: This file defines a React functional component named PreviewCard, which displays a card with a live preview and corresponding code snippet, styled with Tailwind CSS classes.

methods.name: PreviewCard({ title, description, preview, code, language = "jsx" })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a styled card with a title, description, preview content, and a code viewer.
